verses.text: \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \add was\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. And his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Hephzi-bah|strong="H2657"\w*.

And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, after the \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, whom the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* cast \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

For he built \w up|strong="H1129"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* which \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* had \w destroyed|strong="H0006"\w*; and he reared \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* for \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, and \w made|strong="H6213"\w* a \w grove|strong="H0842"\w*, as \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w* all the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* them.

And he \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, of which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, In \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* will I \w put|strong="H7760"\w* my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

And he \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* for all the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* in the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w courts|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And he made his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* through the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and observed \w times|strong="H6049"\w*, and used \w enchantments|strong="H5172"\w*, and \w dealt|strong="H6213"\w* with familiar \w spirits|strong="H0178"\w* and \w wizards|strong="H3049"\w*: he \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to provoke \add him\add* to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w*.

And he \w set|strong="H7760"\w* a graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w* of the \w grove|strong="H0842"\w* that he had \w made|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, of which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and to \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, In this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, which I have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* out of all \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, will I \w put|strong="H7760"\w* my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*:

Neither will I make the \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w move|strong="H5110"\w* any \w more|strong="H3254"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* which I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*; only if they will \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according to all that I have \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* them, and according to all the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* that my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* them.

But they \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not: and \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w seduced|strong="H8582"\w* them to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* more \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* than did the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* whom the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Because \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* these \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*, \add and\add* hath done \w wickedly|strong="H7489"\w* above all that the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, which \add were\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him, and hath made \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* also to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* with his \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*:

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Behold, I \add am\add* \w bringing|strong="H0935"\w* \add such\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* upon \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, that whosoever \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w* of it, \w both|strong="H8147"\w* his \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* shall \w tingle|strong="H6750"\w*.

And I will \w stretch|strong="H5186"\w* over \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* the \w line|strong="H6957"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, and the \w plummet|strong="H4949"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*: and I will \w wipe|strong="H4229"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* as \add a man\add* \w wipeth|strong="H4229"\w* a \w dish|strong="H6747"\w*, \w wiping|strong="H4229"\w* \add it\add*, and \w turning|strong="H2015"\w* \add it\add* upside \w down|strong="H6440"\w*.\f + \fr 21.13 \ft wiping…: Heb. he wipeth and turneth it upon the face thereof\f*

And I will \w forsake|strong="H5203"\w* the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of mine \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, and \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* them into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*; and they shall become a \w prey|strong="H0957"\w* and a \w spoil|strong="H4933"\w* to all their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*;

Because they have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in my \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, and have \w provoked|strong="H4480"\w* me to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w*, since the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, even unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

Moreover \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w*, till he had \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* from one \w end|strong="H6310"\w* to \w another|strong="H6310"\w*; beside his \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* wherewith he made \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, in \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 21.16 \ft from…: Heb. from mouth to mouth\f*

¶ Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, and all that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, and his \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* that he \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*?

And \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* in the \w garden|strong="H1588"\w* of his own \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, in the \w garden|strong="H1588"\w* of \w Uzza|strong="H5798"\w*: and \w Amon|strong="H0526"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

¶ \w Amon|strong="H0526"\w* \add was\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. And his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Meshullemeth|strong="H4922"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Haruz|strong="H2743"\w* of \w Jotbah|strong="H3192"\w*.

And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, as his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w*.

And he \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* in all the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* that his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* walked \w in|strong="H1980"\w*, and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* the \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* that his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w*, and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w* them:

And he \w forsook|strong="H5800"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* not in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

¶ And the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of \w Amon|strong="H0526"\w* \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* against him, and \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in his own \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* all them that had \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* against \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Amon|strong="H0526"\w*; and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* made \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Amon|strong="H0526"\w* which he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*?

And he was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* in his \w sepulchre|strong="H6900"\w* in the \w garden|strong="H1588"\w* of \w Uzza|strong="H5798"\w*: and \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.\f + \fr 21.26 \ft Josiah: Gr. Josias\f*
